title: Center for Student Involvement | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Center for Student Involvement     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Center for Student Involvement      Center for Student Involvement   Main Menu    Get Involved           How to Get Involved    Involvement Opportunities         Student Organizations           Find an Organization    Manage my Organization    Registration 2020-2021    Awards & Recognition    Student Organization Events    Advisors         Programs & Events           Virtual Engagement    Annual Programs & Events    Flames in the City    Cultural & Diversity Programs    Student Activities Board    UIC Radio         About           CSI Staff    Social Media    UIC Impact    Fraternity & Sorority Life    Contact Us          Eyebrow menu    UIC Connection    Student Leadership & Civic Engagement    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Center for Student Involvement       Center for Student Involvement  Ignite Your Passion #ThisisUIC                        VIRTUAL ENGAGEMENT  Dear UIC Community,  The Center for Student Involvement put together some Virtual Resources to help with our new transition to online learning, engagement, and activities.  Here are activities, games, tours to magnificent museums, arts and crafts, exercise and more! Check out our social media for more events.  We are here for you! If you have comments or questions, we are open M-F 8:30-5:00 pm and you can reach us via email studentinvolvement@uic.edu or by phone at 312-413-5070, text:312-725-2793. We are also live on Zoom every Monday from 3pm – 5pm – go.uic.edu/CSI .
